title: Tomb Buster
description: When danger is near, Steven Grant has no fear. Join Grant and his helpful sidekick Rosser as they search the jungle for ancient Aztec treasure.
quote: It’s all right. Those old bones can’t hurt you.
altHero: explorer Steve Grant reaches out to touch an ancient artifact in the jungle
alt1: Rosser, Grant’s young helper, holds up a flashlight in the jungle
alt2: Steve Grant holds up a machete to a human skeleton hanging from above
